text: Die Entscheidung des Tilman Riemenschneider is a 1954 East German television film written by about the medieval wood carver Tilman Riemenschneider. ==External links== * Category:1954 films Category:1954 television plays Category:1950s biographical films Category:German biographical films Category:German television films Category:East German films Category:East German television Category:German-language films Category:German-language television shows Category:Films set in the 16th century Category:Films set in Germany Category:Biographical films about artists Riemenschneider Riemenschneider
title: Die Entscheidung des Tilman Riemenschneider
